Description.Text:
The Somerset House Hotel has been restored to the original splendour of its Edwardian roots. It offers boutique rooms with free Wi-FI, just a 5-minute walk from Southsea Beach. The stylish bedrooms all feature digital TVs and comfortable beds are adorned with Egyptian cotton sheets. Individually designed bathrooms feature fluffy towels, designer toiletries whilst some have either walk-in showers, spa or free standing baths. The hotel is close to Southsea Common and Southsea Castle. Southsea Hovercraft Port is about 1 mile away, and is a quick way to reach the Isle of Wight. Free secure parking is available at the hotel. Please note the check in point for Somerset House Hotel is the Sister Hotel Florence House Hotel at 2 Malvern Road, Southsea,PO5 2NA - just opposite Somerset House.
We have a new snacks menu for travellers who prefer to relax in the hotel after arriving. Hot meals such as crab linguine or wild mushroom risotto are available, or you may prefer a hearty meal of sausage and mash. Lighter options from a smoked salmon sandwich to a simple chicken soup are also available.

SUPERIOR ROOM WITH BATH - Our Superior Suite with Free-Standing Bath sleeps two in a King Size Bed.
This room offers: Digital TV (free), WiFi (free),Ironing Facilities available, Seating Area, Tea/Coffee Maker, Telephone, Egyptian Cotton Bedding and Continental Breakfast is included in the room rate. Cooked Breakfast options are available from GBP 4.
SUPERIOR ROOM WITH SHOWER - Large Superior Room with Super-King Bed features walk-in shower, vanity/make-up area, Egyptian cotton bedding, white fluffy towels and designer bath products. Continental Breakfast is included in the room rate. Cooked Breakfast options are available from GBP 4.
SUPERIOR SUITE - Our Superior Suite has a super-king size four poster bed, Egyptian cotton bedding, white fluffy towels and twin wash basins with designer bath products from Duck Island. There is a double end bath with rain shower in the spacious bathroom. Continental Breakfast is included in the room rate. Cooked Breakfast options are available from GBP 4.
DELUXE KING WITH SPA - Our Deluxe Double room sleeps two in a King Size Bed.
The room features spa bath, white fluffy towels, and designer bath products from Duck Island. The room has a sofa seating area too and free Digital TV plus free Wifi.
Continental Breakfast is included in the room rate. Cooked Breakfast options are available from GBP 4.
EXECUTIVE DOUBLE - Generous King beds, showers and seating, free Digital TV and Wifi included.
Continental Breakfast is included in the room rate. Cooked Breakfast options are available from GBP 4.
